title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully register and login using Supabase Auth and obtain a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid registration details and submit.
Verify that registration succeeds and user is redirected to login.
Navigate to login page.
Input registered username/email and correct password.
Submit login form.
Verify login success and receipt of a valid JWT token.

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect username or password and proper error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input incorrect username/email and/or password.
Submit login form.
Verify login failure and display of appropriate error message.

title: Automated PowerPoint to Video Conversion Success
description: Validate that uploading a valid PPTX file results in successful AI-powered conversion to video within the required time frame.

steps.description: Open project and navigate to PPTX upload section.
Upload a valid PowerPoint presentation (.pptx) file.
Verify file validation passes and upload is accepted.
Trigger the automated AI-based PPTX to video conversion process.
Ensure that conversion completes within 3 minutes.
Verify the output video plays correctly representing the PowerPoint slides with synchronized narration or animations.

title: Automated PowerPoint to Video Conversion Failure on Corrupt File
description: Ensure that uploading a corrupt or unsupported PPTX file triggers proper error handling and user notification.

steps.description: Navigate to PPTX upload interface.
Attempt to upload a corrupt or unsupported PPTX file.
System rejects the file and displays an informative error message.
No video conversion process is initiated.

title: Multi-provider Text-to-Speech Fallback Mechanism
description: Confirm seamless fallback to alternate TTS providers when the primary provider fails or quality is under threshold.

steps.description: Select ElevenLabs as primary TTS provider.
Input text for narration and trigger TTS conversion.
Validate audio output quality score is above 8.5.
Simulate ElevenLabs service failure or low quality output below threshold.
System automatically falls back to Google Cloud TTS and produces acceptable audio output.
Simulate fallback failure for Google Cloud TTS.
System falls back to Azure Speech automatically to generate TTS output.

title: Advanced Video Editor - Real-time Rendering and Timeline Functionality
description: Validate real-time rendering performance, effects application, transitions, and timeline synchronization between audio and visuals.

steps.description: Create or load an existing video project.
Add multiple video clips, images, and audio tracks to the timeline.
Apply different video effects and transitions between clips.
Integrate TTS audio narration.
Use the real-time rendering feature to preview the video.
Verify the rendering latency is under 50ms for audio and visual synchronization.
Ensure all applied effects and transitions appear correctly in the preview.

title: 3D Avatar Integration and Lip-sync Animation
description: Verify proper Ready Player Me avatar integration with facial animation and lip-sync to TTS audio.

steps.description: Create or select a 3D avatar using Ready Player Me integration.
Upload or generate TTS narration audio.
Enable lip-sync and facial animation features.
Verify lip movements and facial animations are properly synchronized with the TTS audio.
Confirm avatar renders correctly in video previews and exports.

title: Project Management CRUD Operations and Collaboration
description: Validate full create, read, update, delete functionality for projects including versioning and multi-user collaboration.

steps.description: Create a new project with required metadata.
Verify project is listed in project dashboard.
Edit project details and save changes.
Verify updates are persisted and visible to collaborators.
Add multiple collaborators with different permission roles.
Confirm collaborators can access and edit as per their permissions.
Delete a project.
Verify project is removed and collaborators lose access.

title: Compliance Templates Accuracy and Validation
description: Verify the template library accurately identifies and enforces regulatory norms with validation correctness above 95%.

steps.description: Select different compliance templates for regulatory standards.
Apply templates to project assets requiring validation.
Verify system correctly identifies regulatory elements within 95% accuracy.
Modify assets to introduce norm violations.
Ensure system detects violations and generates appropriate alerts or blocks.

title: Performance Monitoring and Alerting
description: Verify Web Vitals monitoring, automatic optimizations, and alert notifications are functioning correctly under load.

steps.description: Simulate user interaction and site loading under various network conditions.
Verify First Contentful Paint (FCP) consistently remains under 2.5 seconds.
Confirm API response times are below 300ms.
Trigger performance degradation deliberately.
Check that system automatically optimizes resources.
Validate that smart notification center alerts users or admins appropriately.

title: Notification System Rules and Custom Templates
description: Verify smart notification center delivers customizable notifications based on user preferences and system rules.

steps.description: Set up notification preferences for different notification types.
Trigger various system events such as collaborations, project updates, and alerts.
Verify notifications are delivered according to set preferences.
Confirm notifications use customized templates and display correct content.

title: Mobile Responsiveness and Adaptive Navigation
description: Ensure platform UI adapts flawlessly to different mobile devices with load times under 3 seconds.

steps.description: Access the platform from multiple mobile devices and screen sizes.
Verify UI elements resize, reposition, and behave correctly.
Ensure semantic search and navigation adapt to mobile user experience.
Confirm total page load time is under 3 seconds on average 4G network.

title: API Backend Validation and Real-time WebSocket Support
description: Verify robust backend API with input validation, middleware protections, and real-time websocket communication operates reliably.

steps.description: Send valid and invalid requests to REST API endpoints.
Verify input validation rejects invalid data and proper errors are returned.
Establish websocket connections for collaborative features.
Verify real-time events propagate correctly and with low latency.
Simulate rate-limiting by rapid API requests.
Confirm appropriate rate limiting responses and that security logs capture events.

title: Offline-First and PWA Functionalities
description: Validate offline-first capabilities and PWA service worker functionality with caching and offline asset access.

steps.description: Load the app online, then go offline.
Access previously loaded pages and resources.
Verify cached content is served correctly and app remains functional offline.
Perform project actions offline available per design.
Confirm data syncs properly once back online.

title: Project Versioning and Branch Management
description: Verify Git-like versioning system supports branching, merging, and comparison with correctness and conflict resolution.

steps.description: Create a new branch from an existing project.
Make edits and commits on different branches.
Perform branch merge operations.
Verify merge completes successfully with correct conflict detection and resolution.
Compare changes between branches visually.
Ensure differences are correctly highlighted and accurate.

title: Security - Input Validation, Rate Limiting and Logging
description: Validate all user inputs are sanitized, rate limiting enforced, and detailed security logs are maintained for suspicious activity.

steps.description: Attempt SQL injection and XSS vectors on input fields.
Verify input validation blocks malicious payloads.
Flood API endpoints with rapid requests to trigger rate limits.
Confirm rate limiting activates and emits proper HTTP error (429).
Review security logs after attack simulations.
Ensure all events are logged with sufficient detail.

title: Analytics and User Engagement Tracking
description: Verify analytics module correctly tracks user actions, engagement metrics, and presents accurate dashboards.

steps.description: Perform multiple user actions including project creation, video edits, and playback.
Verify these actions appear correctly in analytics tracking data.
Open analytics dashboard overview.
Confirm metrics such as user engagement, session duration, and video usage display accurately.

title: Error Handling on Multimedia Upload
description: Test the robustness of media upload system handling invalid, large, or unsupported files gracefully.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a file exceeding maximum allowed size.
File upload is rejected with a descriptive error.
Try uploading unsupported file formats.
System denies upload and notifies user.
Upload valid multimedia files and preview them.
Validate preview functionality renders content correctly.
